CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 14, 1958, pg. B7, reads: "GRADUATE DEGREE - Holding the Master of Business Administration Degree, received by Harry William Brown, composing room foreman of The Pittsburgh Courier, is Harry Jr., as his mother, third from right, end, left to right, Mr. and Mrs. Ira P. Johns of Cleveland, Byron Bouttee and Mrs. Alex Haynes of Pittsburgh, observe while on the campus of the University of Pittsburgh."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. and Mr. Ira P. Jones, Harry Brown holding his son, Harry Brown Jr., Julia Brown wearing light colored llama patterned dress, Byron Bouttee, and Mrs. Alex Haynes, posed in front of Cathedral of Learning for Brown Sr.'s graduation from University of Pittsburgh with Master of Business Administration Degree
